subject: Your approval is waiting
body:
Dear Home 0wner 

Are you fed up with paying too much mortgage interest?. Your loan has been approved.

You can receive $228,000 for 
$637 per month.

Please respond Right Now.
http://ilook.tw/ec4h

 

Curt Bartlett
Finance America


Act in the valley so that you need not fear those who stand on the hill.	-Danish proverb
